pageContext.claim: “No, actually [Kristi Noem is] very much of a rebel within Congress. I mean she was somebody that would oftentimes go against Congress. And, I think that's why she probably did so well in terms of her primary election. She -- she's very much of -- and I use the term very affectionately in a sense -- she was very much of a rebel. She wanted things to change in Congress, and she helped.”
pageContext.analysis: It's a stretch to say Rep. Kristi Noem (R-S.D.) is a "rebel." According to FiveThirtyEight Politics, she has voted in line with Trump's position, which generally falls in line with the Republican majority position, 91.9 percent of the time.
